articles.title: Mars probe spots "spider" shapes in Martian Inca City - Salon
articles.description: The European Space Agency's Mars Express spotted carbon dioxide ice producing spider-like plumes

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Climb stairs to live longer, say cardiologists - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Climbing stairs is associated with a longer life, according to research presented at ESC Preventive Cardiology 2024, a scientific congress of the European Society of Cardiology (ESC).
